fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends Object
    The core logic of the game. It controls the other logic modules through an ActiveGame object created by the ActiveGameChanger object.
    Author:
    iah1016

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      GameLogic(Random random, Config config)
      The ActiveGameChanger object is created by the constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameLogic

        public GameLogic(Random random,
                 Config config)
        The ActiveGameChanger object is created by the constructor.
        Parameters:
        random - Random is created by the Main class.
        config - Config is created by the Main class.

    • Method Detail

      • newGame

        public boolean newGame(String[] playerAndSectNames)
                throws FileNotFoundException
        This method creates a new game. It uses the Config files 0-2: [0] the file containing Config variable values, [1] The file containing villager names, [2] The file containing professions.
        Parameters:
        playerAndSectNames - The names are given by the user.
        Returns:
        Returns false if at least one of the files is invalid.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Throws the FileNotFoundException.

      • loadGame

        public boolean loadGame(File saveFile)
        The LoadGame feature is not yet implemented.
        Parameters:
        saveFile - The values will be read from a text file.
        Returns:
        Returns false if the save file is invalid.

      • conversion

        public boolean conversion(Villager villager,
                          char option)
        Player attempts to convert a villager.
        Parameters:
        villager - The Player has chosen the target villager beforehand.
        option - (a) Persuasion, (b) Sermon, (c) Accusation.
        Returns:
        If the conversion is allowed (ie. the maximum amount of attempts has not been reached) and it is successful, then the method returns true.

      • templeActions

        public boolean templeActions(char option)
        The actions that are set in the sect's temple. Options (b) and (c) will end the game, if the conditions are met.
        Parameters:
        option - (a) Preach, (b) Offer soda (c) Buy a one-way ticket.
        Returns:
        Case (a) is returns true, unless the congregation size is zero, (b) requires a high playerCharisma and (c) a high balance.

      • trainingCentreActions

        public boolean trainingCentreActions(char option)
        These are the actions that are set in the training centre.
        Parameters:
        option - (a) apply for a charisma course (increases playerCharisma), (b) apply for a debate course (increases playerArgSkills).
        Returns:
        Both options (a) and (b) always return true.

      • endTurn

        public boolean endTurn()
        This method executes the TurnLogic's nextTurn-method.
        Returns:
        False equals that the game is finished.

      • getActiveGame

        public ActiveGame getActiveGame()

      • getConfigFiles

        public File[] getConfigFiles()
        The configuration files are: [0] the file containing Config variable values, [1] the file containing villager names, [2] the file containing professions, [3] the language settings.
        Returns:
        Returns the array of the configuration files.
